name: healthcare-research-mcp
description: MCP server for health services research with OMOP/CLIF support

scripts.collect:all: npm run collect:schemas && npm run collect:ontologies
scripts.build:test: tsc src/server/index-test.ts --outDir dist/server --module esnext --target es2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:standalone: tsc src/server/index-standalone.ts --outDir dist/server --module esnext --target es2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:enhanced: tsc src/server/index-enhanced.ts src/utils/fetch-guidelines.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:complete: tsc src/server/index-complete.ts src/utils/fetch-guidelines.ts src/utils/enhanced-code-generator.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:omop: tsc src/server/index-omop-enhanced.ts src/utils/fetch-guidelines.ts src/utils/enhanced-code-generator.ts src/utils/fetch-omop-cdm.ts src/utils/medical-ontologies.ts --outDir dist --module esnext --target es2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
